About Me

I am a motivated self-taught programmer. I recently completed Free Code Camps Responsive Web Design Developer Certification, representing approximately 300 hours of coursework. I am currently taking Scrimba's Frontend Developer Carrer Path.

I am also a musician. I play guitar and have extensive experience in performing, recording, and producing music.
